last_episode_to_air.name: Dad Comes to Visit
last_episode_to_air.overview: Rob's father comes to visit and bonds with Maggie's family more than he ever has with Rob. Meanwhile, Rosa tries to teach Hector to cook.

name: ¡Rob!
overview: Rob is an American comedy television series that premiered on CBS on January 12, 2012, at 8:30 pm as a midseason replacement for Rules of Engagement, and ended on March 1, 2012. The series stars Rob Schneider alongside Cheech Marin, Claudia Bassols, Diana Maria Riva, Eugenio Derbez, Ricky Rico, and Lupe Ontiveros. The show was produced by Two and a Half Men's The Tannenbaum Company and CBS Television Studios. On May 13, 2012, CBS canceled the series.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Rob meets his new wife's Mexican family, and his first day with them is a fiasco.

episodes.name: Second Wedding
episodes.overview: Maggie's parents want Rob and Maggie to have a second wedding, which leads to several arguments.

episodes.name: The Pillow
episodes.overview: Maggie tries to redecorate the house by putting a new pillow on the couch, which makes Rob uncomfortable and leads to a fight. Meanwhile, Hector gets a job at Fernando's car wash, which he totally screws up.

episodes.name: Family Secrets
episodes.overview: Rob inadvertently starts a fight between Fernando and Rosa when he shares an old secret that Maggie had told to him. Wondering if Maggie has any such secrets, Rob then "discovers" an old picture of Maggie with a hot former boyfriend and becomes jealous, thinking he is not good enough for her.

episodes.name: Rob Learns Spanish
episodes.overview: Rob secretly asks Hector to teach him Spanish so that he can understand what Maggie's family is saying about him. Meanwhile, Fernando lies to Rosa about his diet and exercising.

episodes.name: The Baby Bug
episodes.overview: Maggie and her parents use a cute baby to try to make Rob change his mind about not wanting children. Meanwhile, the family helps Fernando with a commercial for his car wash franchise.

episodes.name: Romantic Weekend
episodes.overview: Rob plans a romantic weekend at home with Maggie. However, when Fernando kicks out Hector and Rosa subsequently kicks out Fernando, they both move in with Rob and ruin the weekend.

episodes.name: Dad Comes to Visit
episodes.overview: Rob's father comes to visit and bonds with Maggie's family more than he ever has with Rob. Meanwhile, Rosa tries to teach Hector to cook.
